bug.question: I am small and black, and I like to march in a line. What am I?

hints.text: 🖤 I'm often found on the ground.
🐜 I'm a very busy worker.
💪 I can carry things bigger than myself.

bug.question: I have wings and like to buzz. I make yummy honey. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🌻 I like to fly around flowers.
🍯 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I have pretty wings and fly around. I used to be a caterpillar! What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors on my wings.
🍃 I eat leaves when I am little.
🦋 I am very gentle.

bug.question: I hop around and have long legs. I make a 'ribbit' sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I like to live near water.
🦟 I like to eat bugs.
💚 I am green.

bug.question: I am red with black spots and bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 People like to see me in their garden.
⚫ I have dots on my back.
🍎 I am the same color as a red apple.

bug.question: I wiggle in the dirt and help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 Birds like to eat me.
🪴 I help keep the soil healthy.
🚫 I do not have legs.

bug.question: I like to eat wood and live in a big group in the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I live in tunnels I build.
🪵 I can damage wooden houses.
🐜 I am related to ants, but I am usually white.

bug.question: I have eight legs and spin a web. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I catch food in my sticky home.
🕷️ Some people are scared of me.
🏠 I live in the corner of your house... maybe!

bug.question: I glow in the dark at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I use light to attract a partner.
💡 I am sometimes called a lightning bug.
🌃 I can be seen on a summer night.

bug.question: I can be green or brown and hide in the leaves. I look just like a stick. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am very good at hiding.
🌳 I eat leaves from trees.
🦯 I can be hard to spot.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats can float on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I like to hide in my shell.
🥗 I eat seaweed.
👶 Baby ones hatch from eggs!

ocean.question: I am a very big animal in the ocean that sings songs, what am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I am very big and make a lot of noise.
💨 I breathe air through a hole on top of my head.
💦 People say I am very smart!

ocean.question: I am long and thin and swim in the ocean. Sometimes I hide in the sand! What am I?

hints.text: 〰️ I don't have legs!
🐟 Some people eat me.
🕳️ Sometimes I live in a hole.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I have many arms.
⚫ I can squirt ink!
🪨 I like to hide among rocks.

ocean.question: I live in the ocean and I have a hard shell and claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I walk sideways.
🍽️ Some people eat me with butter!
🏘️ I can live in a hole on the beach.

ocean.question: I'm a fish with a funny name, I can be flat on both sides. What am I?

hints.text: 🥞 I am flat like a pancake.
👀 Both of my eyes are on the same side.
🎭 I can camouflage with the ocean floor.

ocean.question: I look like a star and live on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I have five arms.
🌊 I live in the sea!
✨ I am shaped like a star.

ocean.question: I’m an animal that lives in the sea, and I have a pouch for my babies. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I have a horse in my name.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 The daddy carries the babies.
🌱 I eat small plants and animals.

ocean.question: I am a very big fish with lots of sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🦷 My teeth are very sharp.
🏊 Some people are afraid of me.
